019package de.mnl.osgi.bnd.repository.maven.idxmvn;
020
021import aQute.bnd.http.HttpClient;
022import aQute.bnd.osgi.repository.ResourcesRepository;
023import aQute.bnd.osgi.repository.XMLResourceGenerator;
024import aQute.bnd.osgi.repository.XMLResourceParser;
025import aQute.maven.api.Archive;
026import aQute.maven.api.Program;
027import aQute.maven.api.Revision;
028import aQute.maven.provider.MavenBackingRepository;
029import aQute.service.reporter.Reporter;
030import de.mnl.osgi.bnd.maven.BoundArchive;
031import de.mnl.osgi.bnd.maven.CompositeMavenRepository.BinaryLocation;
032import de.mnl.osgi.bnd.maven.MavenResource;
033import de.mnl.osgi.bnd.maven.MavenResourceException;
034import de.mnl.osgi.bnd.maven.MavenVersion;
035import de.mnl.osgi.bnd.maven.MavenVersionRange;
036import de.mnl.osgi.bnd.maven.MavenVersionSpecification;
037import static de.mnl.osgi.bnd.maven.RepositoryUtils.rethrow;
038import static de.mnl.osgi.bnd.maven.RepositoryUtils.runIgnoring;
039import static de.mnl.osgi.bnd.maven.RepositoryUtils.unthrow;
040import java.io.File;
041import java.io.IOException;
042import java.io.InputStream;
043import java.io.Writer;
044import java.net.URI;
045import java.nio.charset.Charset;
046import java.nio.file.Files;
047import java.nio.file.Path;
048import java.util.ArrayList;
049import java.util.Collection;
050import java.util.Collections;
051import java.util.Comparator;
052import java.util.HashSet;
053import java.util.List;
054import java.util.Map;
055import java.util.Optional;
056import java.util.Properties;
057import java.util.Set;
058import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
059import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
060import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentMap;
061import java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException;
062import java.util.function.Supplier;
063import java.util.regex.Matcher;
064import java.util.regex.Pattern;
065import java.util.stream.Collectors;
066import java.util.stream.Stream;
067import org.apache.maven.model.Dependency;
068import org.osgi.resource.Capability;
069import org.osgi.resource.Resource;
070import org.slf4j.Logger;
071import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
072
073/**
074 * A repository with artifacts from a single group.
075 */
076@SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis", "PMD.TooManyFields",
077    "PMD.ExcessiveImports" })
078public class MavenGroupRepository extends ResourcesRepository {
079
080    private static final Logger LOG = LoggerFactory.getLogger(
081        MavenGroupRepository.class);
082
083    /** Indexing state. */
084    private enum IndexingState {
085        NONE, INDEXING, INDEXED, EXCLUDED, EXCL_BY_DEP
086    }
087
088    private final String groupId;
089    private boolean requested;
090    private final IndexedMavenRepository indexedRepository;
091    private final HttpClient client;
092    private final Reporter reporter;
093    private Path groupDir;
094    private Path groupPropsPath;
095    private Path groupIndexPath;
096    private final Properties groupProps;
097    private VersionSpecification[] versionSpecs = new VersionSpecification[0];
098    private final ConcurrentMap<Archive, IndexingState> indexingState
099        = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
100    private ResourcesRepository backupRepo;
101    private Writer indexingLog;
102    private Map<Revision, List<String>> loggedMessages
103        = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
104
105    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.FieldNamingConventions")
106    private static final Pattern hrefPattern = Pattern.compile(
107        "<[aA]\\s+(?:[^>]*?\\s+)?href=(?<quote>[\"'])"
108            + ":?(?<href>[a-zA-Z].*?)\\k<quote>");
109
110    /**
111     * Instantiates a new representation of group data backed
112     * by the specified directory. 
113     *
114     * @param groupId the maven groupId indexed by this repository
115     * @param directory the directory used to persist data
116     * @param requested if it is a requested group id
117     * @param indexedRepository the indexed maven repository
118     * @param client the client used for remote access
119     * @param reporter the reporter
120     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
121     */
122    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.ConfusingTernary",
123        "PMD.AvoidCatchingGenericException", "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals" })
124    public MavenGroupRepository(String groupId, Path directory,
125            boolean requested, IndexedMavenRepository indexedRepository,
126            HttpClient client, Reporter reporter) throws IOException {
127        this.groupId = groupId;
128        this.requested = requested;
129        this.indexedRepository = indexedRepository;
130        this.client = client;
131        this.reporter = reporter;
132
133        // Prepare directory and files
134        updatePaths(directory);
135        groupProps = new Properties();
136        if (groupPropsPath.toFile().canRead()) {
137            try (InputStream input = Files.newInputStream(groupPropsPath)) {
138                groupProps.load(input);
139                versionSpecs = VersionSpecification.parse(groupProps);
140            }
141        }
142
143        // Prepare OSGi repository
144        if (groupIndexPath.toFile().canRead()) {
145            try (XMLResourceParser parser
146                = new XMLResourceParser(groupIndexPath.toFile())) {
147                addAll(parser.parse());
148            } catch (Exception e) { // NOPMD
149                reporter.warning("Cannot parse %s, ignored: %s", groupIndexPath,
150                    e.getMessage());
151            }
152        }
153
154        // Re-use exiting resources for faster checks.
155        for (Capability cap : findProvider(
156            newRequirementBuilder("bnd.info").build())) {
157            indexingState.put(
158                Archive.valueOf((String) cap.getAttributes().get("from")),
159                IndexingState.INDEXED);
160        }
161        LOG.debug("Created group repository for {}.", groupId);
162    }
163
164    private void updatePaths(Path directory) {
165        if (!directory.toFile().exists()) {
166            directory.toFile().mkdir();
167        }
168        groupDir = directory;
169        groupPropsPath = groupDir.resolve("group.properties");
170        groupIndexPath = groupDir.resolve("index.xml");
171    }
172
173    private IndexingState indexingState(Archive archive) {
174        return indexingState.getOrDefault(archive, IndexingState.NONE);
175    }
176
177    /**
178     * Checks if is requested.
179     *
180     * @return the requested
181     */
182    public final boolean isRequested() {
183        return requested;
184    }
185
186    /**
187     * Writes all changes to persistent storage and removes
188     * any backup information prepared by {@link #reset(Path, boolean)}.
189     *
190     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
191     */
192    public void flush() throws IOException {
193        boolean indexChanged = true;
194        if (backupRepo != null) {
195            Set<Resource> oldSet = new HashSet<>(backupRepo.getResources());
196            Set<Resource> newSet = new HashSet<>(getResources());
197            if (newSet.equals(oldSet)) {
198                indexChanged = false;
199            }
200        }
201        if (indexChanged) {
202            XMLResourceGenerator generator = new XMLResourceGenerator();
203            generator.resources(getResources());
204            generator.name(indexedRepository.mavenRepository().name());
205            try {
206                generator.save(groupIndexPath.toFile());
207            } catch (IOException e) {
208                reporter.exception(e, "Cannot save %s.", groupIndexPath);
209            }
210        }
211        backupRepo = null;
212        if (indexingLog != null) {
213            rethrow(IOException.class, () -> loggedMessages.entrySet().stream()
214                .sorted(Map.Entry.comparingByKey())
215                .flatMap(e -> e.getValue().stream())
216                .forEach(msg -> unthrow(() -> indexingLog
217                    .write(msg + System.lineSeparator()))));
218            indexingLog.close();
219            indexingLog = null;
220        }
221        loggedMessages.clear();
222        indexingState.clear();
223    }
224
225    /**
226     * Removes the group directory if empty.
227     *
228     * @return true, if removed
229     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
230     */
231    public boolean removeIfRedundant() throws IOException {
232        if (isRequested() || !groupProps.isEmpty()
233            || !getResources().isEmpty()) {
234            return false;
235        }
236        // Nothing in this group
237        Files.walk(groupDir)
238            .sorted(Comparator.reverseOrder())
239            .map(Path::toFile)
240            .forEach(File::delete);
241        return true;
242    }
243
244    /**
245     * Returns the group id.
246     *
247     * @return the groupId
248     */
249    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.ShortMethodName")
250    public final String id() {
251        return groupId;
252    }
253
254    /**
255     * Clears this repository and updates the path and the requested 
256     * flag. Keeps the current content as backup for reuse in a 
257     * subsequent call to {@link #reload()}.
258     *
259     * @param directory this group's directory
260     * @param requested whether this is a requested group
261     */
262    public void reset(Path directory, boolean requested) {
263        synchronized (this) {
264            // Update basic properties
265            this.requested = requested;
266            if (!groupDir.equals(directory)) {
267                updatePaths(directory);
268                backupRepo = null;
269            } else {
270                // Save current content and clear.
271                backupRepo = new ResourcesRepository(getResources());
272            }
273            set(Collections.emptyList());
274            // Clear and reload properties
275            groupProps.clear();
276            if (groupPropsPath.toFile().canRead()) {
277                try (InputStream input = Files.newInputStream(groupPropsPath)) {
278                    groupProps.load(input);
279                    versionSpecs = VersionSpecification.parse(groupProps);
280                } catch (IOException e) {
281                    reporter.warning("Problem reading %s (ignored): %s",
282                        groupPropsPath, e.getMessage());
283                }
284            }
285            // Clear remaining caches.
286            indexingState.clear();
287        }
288    }
289
290    /**
291     * Reload the repository. Requested repositories retrieve
292     * the list of known artifactIds from the remote repository 
293     * and add the versions. For versions already in the repository, 
294     * the backup information is re-used.
295     *
296     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
297     */
298    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidReassigningLoopVariables",
299        "PMD.AvoidCatchingGenericException", "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals",
300        "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops",
301        "PMD.AvoidThrowingRawExceptionTypes", "PMD.PreserveStackTrace" })
302    public void reload() throws IOException {
303        if (indexedRepository.logIndexing()) {
304            indexingLog = Files.newBufferedWriter(
305                groupDir.resolve("indexing.log"), Charset.defaultCharset());
306        } else {
307            // Don't keep out-dated log files, it's irritating.
308            groupDir.resolve("indexing.log").toFile().delete();
309        }
310        loggedMessages.clear();
311        if (!isRequested()) {
312            // Will be filled with dependencies only
313            return;
314        }
315        // Actively filled.
316        synchronized (this) {
317            if (backupRepo == null) {
318                backupRepo = new ResourcesRepository(getResources());
319            }
320        }
321        try {
322            CompletableFuture<?>[] artifactLoaders = findArtifactIds()
323                .stream().map(
324                    artifactId -> loadProgram(
325                        Program.valueOf(groupId, artifactId)))
326                .toArray(CompletableFuture[]::new);
327            CompletableFuture.allOf(artifactLoaders).get();
328        } catch (ExecutionException e) {
329            if (e.getCause() instanceof IOException) {
330                throw (IOException) e.getCause();
331            }
332            throw new RuntimeException(e.getCause());
333        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
334            throw new RuntimeException(e);
335        }
336    }
337
338    private CompletableFuture<Void> loadProgram(Program program) {
339        // Get revisions of program and process.
340        CompletableFuture<Void> result = new CompletableFuture<>();
341        IndexedMavenRepository.programLoaders.submit(() -> {
342            String threadName = Thread.currentThread().getName();
343            try {
344                Thread.currentThread().setName("RevisionQuerier " + program);
345                Stream<CompletableFuture<Void>> revLoaderStream
346                    = indexedRepository.mavenRepository().findRevisions(program)
347                        .flatMap(revision -> {
348                            var archives = VersionSpecification
349                                .toSelected(versionSpecs, revision);
350                            if (archives.isEmpty()) {
351                                logIndexing(revision.unbound(),
352                                    () -> String.format(
353                                        "%s not selected for indexing.",
354                                        revision.unbound()));
355                            }
356                            return archives.stream();
357                        }).map(archive -> loadArchive(archive));
358
359                // Complete all completables
360                revLoaderStream.forEach(
361                    revLoad -> unthrow(() -> revLoad.handle((res, thrw) -> {
362                        return null;
363                    }).get()));
364            } catch (Throwable t) {
365                reporter.exception(t,
366                    "Failed to get list of revisions of %s: %s", program,
367                    t.getMessage());
368            } finally {
369                Thread.currentThread().setName(threadName);
370                result.complete(null);
371            }
372        });
373        return result;
374    }
375
376    /**
377     * Load the archive asynchronously (if selected). Calling 
378     * {@link CompletableFuture#get()} never returns an exception. 
379     *
380     * @param archive the revision
381     * @return the completable future
382     */
383    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidCatchingGenericException",
384        "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals",
385        "PMD.PositionLiteralsFirstInComparisons" })
386    private CompletableFuture<Void> loadArchive(BoundArchive archive) {
387        return CompletableFuture.runAsync(() -> {
388            IndexingState curState = indexingState.putIfAbsent(
389                archive, IndexingState.INDEXING);
390            if (curState != null && curState != IndexingState.INDEXING) {
391                // Already handled (as dependency)
392                logIndexing(archive.revision, () -> String.format(
393                    "%s in list (already handled as dependency).", archive));
394                return;
395            }
396            LOG.debug("Loading archive {}.", archive);
397            logIndexing(archive.revision,
398                () -> String.format("%s in list, indexing...", archive));
399            String threadName = Thread.currentThread().getName();
400            try {
401                Thread.currentThread().setName("ArchiveLoader " + archive);
402                MavenResource resource = indexedRepository.mavenRepository()
403                    .resource(archive, BinaryLocation.REMOTE);
404                Set<MavenResource> allDeps = new HashSet<>();
405                if (!isIndexable(resource, allDeps)) {
406                    return;
407                }
408                addResourceAndDependencies(resource, allDeps);
409            } catch (Exception e) {
410                // Load "in isolation", don't propagate individual failure.
411                reporter.exception(e, "Failed to load revision %s: %s",
412                    archive, e.getMessage());
413                logIndexing(archive.revision, () -> String.format(
414                    "%s failed to load: %s.", archive, e.getMessage()));
415            } finally {
416                Thread.currentThread().setName(threadName);
417            }
418        }, IndexedMavenRepository.revisionLoaders);
419    }
420
421    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidCatchingGenericException",
422        "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops" })
423    private Collection<String> findArtifactIds() {
424        Set<String> result = new HashSet<>();
425        for (MavenBackingRepository repo : indexedRepository.mavenRepository()
426            .backing()) {
427            URI groupUri = null;
428            try {
429                groupUri
430                    = repo.toURI("").resolve(groupId.replace('.', '/') + "/");
431                String page = client.build().headers("User-Agent", "Bnd")
432                    .get(String.class)
433                    .go(groupUri);
434                if (page == null) {
435                    continue;
436                }
437                Matcher matcher = hrefPattern.matcher(page);
438                while (matcher.find()) {
439                    URI programUri = groupUri.resolve(matcher.group("href"));
440                    String artifactId = programUri.getPath()
441                        .substring(groupUri.getPath().length());
442                    if (artifactId.endsWith("/")) {
443                        artifactId
444                            = artifactId.substring(0, artifactId.length() - 1);
445                    }
446                    result.add(artifactId);
447                }
448            } catch (Exception e) {
449                reporter.warning("Problem retrieving %s, skipped: %s", groupUri,
450                    e.getMessage());
451            }
452        }
453        return result;
454    }
455
456    private void addResourceAndDependencies(MavenResource resource,
457            Set<MavenResource> allDeps) {
458        addResource(resource);
459        // Add the dependencies found while checking to the index.
460        try {
461            rethrow(IOException.class, () -> allDeps.stream()
462                .forEach(res -> runIgnoring(() -> indexedRepository
463                    .getOrCreateGroupRepository(
464                        res.archive().getRevision().group)
465                    .addResource(res))));
466        } catch (Exception e) {
467            // Load "in isolation", don't propagate individual failure.
468            reporter.exception(e, "Failed to add resource %s: %s",
469                resource.archive(), e.getMessage());
470            logIndexing(resource.archive().revision, () -> String.format(
471                "%s failed to load.", resource.archive()));
472        }
473    }
474
475    /**
476     * Checks if the given resource is indexable, considering its 
477     * dependencies. A resource is indexable if its dependencies aren't
478     * excluded.
479     *
480     * @param resource the resource to check
481     * @param dependencies revisions that must additionally be included
482     *    when the checked revision is added
483     * @return true, if the revision can be added to the index
484     */
485    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.LongVariable", "PMD.NPathComplexity",
486        "PMD.AvoidCatchingGenericException" })
487    private boolean isIndexable(MavenResource resource,
488            Set<MavenResource> dependencies) {
489        Archive archive = resource.archive();
490        if (!archive.revision.group.equals(groupId)) {
491            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Wrong groupId "
492                + archive.revision.group + " (must be " + groupId + ").");
493        }
494        // Check if already decided.
495        switch (indexingState(archive)) {
496        case INDEXED:
497            return true;
498        case EXCLUDED:
499        case EXCL_BY_DEP:
500            return false;
501        default:
502            break;
503        }
504        // Check if excluded by rule.
505        if (VersionSpecification
506            .excluded(versionSpecs, archive.revision.artifact)
507            .includes(MavenVersion.from(archive.revision.version))) {
508            if (indexingState.replace(archive, IndexingState.INDEXING,
509                IndexingState.EXCLUDED)) {
510                logIndexing(archive.revision,
511                    () -> String.format("%s is excluded by rule.", archive));
512            }
513            return false;
514        }
515        boolean isForced = VersionSpecification.isForced(versionSpecs, archive);
516
517        // Check whether excluded because dependency is excluded
518        List<Dependency> deps = evaluateDependencies(resource);
519        for (Dependency dep : deps) {
520            MavenGroupRepository depRepo;
521            try {
522                depRepo = indexedRepository
523                    .getOrCreateGroupRepository(dep.getGroupId());
524            } catch (Exception e) {
525                // Failing to get a dependency is no reason to fail.
526                continue;
527            }
528            Optional<MavenResource> optRes = depRepo.dependencyToResource(dep);
529            if (!optRes.isPresent()) {
530                // Failing to get a dependency is no reason to fail.
531                continue;
532            }
533            MavenResource depResource = optRes.get();
534            // Watch out to use the proper repository in the code following!
535            depRepo.logIndexing(depResource.archive().revision,
536                () -> String.format("%s is dependency of %s, indexing...",
537                    depResource.archive(), archive));
538            depRepo.indexingState.putIfAbsent(depResource.archive(),
539                IndexingState.INDEXING);
540            Set<MavenResource> collectedDeps = new HashSet<>();
541            if (!depRepo.isIndexable(depResource, collectedDeps)) {
542                // Note that the revision which was checked is not indexable
543                // due to a dependency that is not indexable (unless forced)
544                if (!isForced) {
545                    if (indexingState.replace(archive, IndexingState.INDEXING,
546                        IndexingState.EXCL_BY_DEP)) {
547                        logIndexing(archive.revision, () -> String.format(
548                            "%s not indexable, depends on %s.",
549                            archive, depResource.archive()));
550                    }
551                    return false;
552                }
553            }
554            if (!VersionSpecification.toSelected(depRepo.versionSpecs,
555                depResource.archive().revision).isEmpty()) {
556                // Has just been indexed as dependency, but would have
557                // been indexed (as selected) anyway, so add independent
558                // of outcome of dependency evaluation.
559                depRepo.addResourceAndDependencies(depResource, collectedDeps);
560            } else {
561                dependencies.add(depResource);
562                dependencies.addAll(collectedDeps);
563            }
564        }
565        return true;
566    }
567
568    private List<Dependency> evaluateDependencies(MavenResource resource) {
569        List<Dependency> deps;
570        try {
571            deps = resource.dependencies();
572        } catch (Exception e) {
573            // Failing to get the dependencies is no reason to fail.
574            return Collections.emptyList();
575        }
576        if (!deps.isEmpty()) {
577            logIndexing(resource.archive().revision,
578                () -> String.format("%s has dependencies: %s",
579                    resource.archive(), deps.stream()
580                        .map(d -> d.getGroupId() + ":" + d.getArtifactId() + ":"
581                            + d.getVersion())
582                        .collect(Collectors.joining(", "))));
583        }
584        return deps;
585    }
586
587    private Optional<MavenResource> dependencyToResource(Dependency dep) {
588        Program depPgm = Program.valueOf(dep.getGroupId(), dep.getArtifactId());
589        try {
590            return indexedRepository.mavenRepository().resource(
591                depPgm, narrowVersion(depPgm, MavenVersionSpecification
592                    .from(dep.getVersion())),
593                dep.getType(), dep.getClassifier(),
594                BinaryLocation.REMOTE);
595        } catch (Exception e) {
596            // Failing to get a dependency is no reason to fail.
597            return Optional.empty();
598        }
599    }
600
601    private MavenVersionSpecification narrowVersion(
602            Program program, MavenVersionSpecification version)
603            throws IOException {
604        if (version instanceof MavenVersion) {
605            // Specific version, leave as is.
606            return version;
607        }
608        // If it's a range, restrict it to allowed
609        MavenVersionRange excluded = VersionSpecification
610            .excluded(versionSpecs, program.artifact);
611        return excluded.complement().restrict((MavenVersionRange) version);
612    }
613
614    /**
615     * Adds the specified revision.
616     *
617     * @param revision the revision to add
618     */
619    private void addResource(MavenResource resource) {
620        synchronized (indexingState) {
621            if (indexingState(resource.archive()) == IndexingState.INDEXED) {
622                return;
623            }
624            try {
625                add(resource.asResource());
626                logIndexing(resource.archive().revision,
627                    () -> String.format("%s indexed.", resource.archive()));
628            } catch (MavenResourceException e) {
629                reporter.exception(e, "Failed to get %s as resource.",
630                    resource.toString());
631                logIndexing(resource.archive().revision,
632                    () -> String.format("%s could not be index: %s.",
633                        resource.archive(), e.getMessage()));
634            }
635            indexingState.put(resource.archive(), IndexingState.INDEXED);
636        }
637    }
638
639    /* package */ Optional<Resource> searchInBackup(Archive archive) {
640        if (backupRepo == null) {
641            return Optional.empty();
642        }
643        return backupRepo.findProvider(
644            backupRepo.newRequirementBuilder("bnd.info")
645                .addDirective("filter",
646                    String.format("(from=%s)", archive.toString()))
647                .build())
648            .stream().findFirst().map(Capability::getResource);
649    }
650
651    private void logIndexing(Revision revision, Supplier<String> msgSupplier) {
652        loggedMessages
653            .computeIfAbsent(revision,
654                rev -> Collections.synchronizedList(new ArrayList<>()))
655            .add(msgSupplier.get());
656    }
657
658    /*
659     * (non-Javadoc)
660     * 
661     * @see java.lang.Object#toString()
662     */
663    @Override
664    public String toString() {
665        return "MavenGroupRepository [groupId=" + groupId + "]";
666    }
667}
